content:
I have not made progress on my task (cargo integration with jobserver), but I would like to spend a bit of time discussing a potential idea I had which is potentially a simpler replacement than what we originally had in mind. Essentially instead of fully replacing the jobserver, the jobserver crate when configuring a process with the file descriptors would create a new pipe for each process and spawn up a global, single, thread which epolls across all of the process file descriptors. I think in theory this should be easier to implement but am interested in hearing what @Alex Crichton thinks.

@WG-parallel-rustc with the above in mind, I don't know if it makes sense for all of us to meet...
(and maybe even we can discuss that idea async with Alex)
I'm still with some Mir-opt stuff and haven't jumped back into this
@Alex Crichton do you want to generate a zoom link?
sorry I've been missing meetings... I hope to get more involved again after the new year
